document_data.name: Caddelyn's Workbook
document_data.author: [[Caddelyn]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Caddelyn's Workbook''''' was the incomplete [[spellbook]] of the long-deceased [[mage]] [[Caddelyn]].
document_data.Description: The spellbook had a [[silver]]-plated cover of slate, with [[electrum]] hinges, which held together sixteen sheets of parchment.
document_data.History: Shortly before [[1359 DR]], ''Caddelyn's Workbook'' was looted from [[Caddelyn's tower|his tower]] north of the [[Great Glacier]] by unknown forces. It was briefly recovered by the adventurer [[Dabron Sashenstar]], who held onto it until his party camped for the night, whereupon it went missing again.
